actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide emergency relief, rehabilitation and humanitarian assistance to the people of Lebanon, and to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

summary.text: Special Lebanon Relief Act - Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to authorize the President to furnish assistance, including the issuance of housing guaranties, for the relief and rehabilitation of refugees and other needy people in Lebanon. Authorizes the appropriation of $20,000,000 for such purposes.

titles.title: A bill to provide emergency relief, rehabilitation and humanitarian assistance to the people of Lebanon, and to amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.
